subject: Frank's Box & I on GHOSTOLOGY
author: April Slaughter
full_text:
Just thought I would let you all know that I have been asked to be on
GHOSTOLOGY (Para-X Radio) on July 26th to discuss the various ITC
devices. Frank's Box will obviously be the highlight of the discussion
:-) Hope you'll tune in!

http://www.paranormalsource.com/index.php?cat=3
